title: The Legend of 1900 OST
description:
The Legend of 1900 (1998) OST

This is the fully version of this great soundtrack, with all tracks included in the Italian version. "The Legend of 1900" re-release by Sony isn&#039;t the version with the entire soundtrack on it. Some of the best pieces were only included in the Italian version, as (among others) "Magic Waltz" (the song he plays for his seasick friend with the waves crashing outside) and "Enduring Movement" (the piece that won the contest with Jelly Roll Morton).
More information here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Legend_of_1900_(soundtrack)
